title: Looking for Gold+ Players
body: A few of my platinum friends and I are looking for some players that we can make a ranked 5 team with. We are looking for players that are daily active and which to play seriously. If you are interested play let me know by adding me or commenting.

replies.body:
G'day.
I main mid.
My champion pool is pretty big, but the champs I'm really comfortable on are: Leblanc, Xerath, Syndra, Zed.

Currently G4, but honestly, the SoloQ cancer is holding me back =].
P5 Here support main Mr Froggy
Jungle/top main here. At g4 atm.
I was Gold5 in preseason and climbing but haven't played ranked since until now. Currently s4

Hey man, 

I am interested in your post but the only problem is, solo queue rating I am Silver 1 at the moment. But the thing is, I have coached many teams before and have had gotten 2 teams to plat. I do know my stuff and have been in many ranked teams each doing my best in part to achieve maximum results. I would be higher in rating if I put a lot more time into solo queue, but at the moment, teams is the way to go for competitive play. So that being said, although it is a team full of plats and stuff, I do keep high up with them and can play just about any role required, I am not a casual player so I am hoping I can hear from you soon.

Thanks, Sir Jazza.
